description.value: At 8th level, when entering a bloodrage, you can choose to apply the effects of either @Compendium[pf1.spells.r190q9zxmei82lmv]{Displacement} or @Compendium[pf1.spells.s9amdo5398alb5p0]{Haste} to yourself. This is in addition to arcane bloodrage, and otherwise works as that ability.
